projects.title: Movie Application
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Movie Website made in React
 -  Fully customizable and dynamic 
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Restaurant Ordering System
projects.bodyText:
- A restaurant ordering system made with **Vue.js** for **Restaurant** clients. People can create a new account.
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **Node Mailer**.
 - Client can order table in the restaurant or pass an order and choose the delivery method .

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.bodyText: - A web App that **Manage users Tasks**.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.bodyText: - A web App that allows users to  check daily the weather.

projects.title: Chatbot App
projects.bodyText:
- A web App that Developed a chatbot application that allows users to interact with a user-friendly and interactive platform where users can engage with an intelligent chatbot to seek assistance, information. 
 - Using MERN stack with TypeScript
